CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Timesheet_Status__c, "NOT SUBMITTED"),"NOT SUBMITTED", IF(ISPICKVAL(Timesheet_Status__c, "SUBMITTED"),"SUBMITTED", IF(ISPICKVAL(Timesheet_Status__c, "APPROVED"),"APPROVED", IF(ISPICKVAL(Timesheet_Status__c, "NOT APPROVED"),"NOT APPROVED", ""))))
CustomField.label: Status
